assignments.name: Assign_Contact_ID_from_Project_Contact_Role
assignments.label: Assign Contact ID from Project Contact Role

assignments.name: Assign_Contact_IDs_from_Billing_Contacts
assignments.label: Assign Contact IDs from Billing Contacts

Flow.description: LR 11/22/23: Added Invoice Date input on the screen and rerouted component GC 11/10/23: Removed the Back Button LWC. GC 12/13/22: Ask the user to select "Billing Contact", which will be retrieved from the "Project". Relate this to the Invoice and to the Project (if it is not there already). // GC 12/09/22: Creates an Invoice record based on selected Final Usage records and relates it to the same.
Flow.interviewLabel: Create Invoice from Final Usage Records {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Create Invoice from Final Usage Records

loops.description: GC: Loop through the Final Usage records to find if any of them is invalid. If they have a related Invoice, check them as invalid.
loops.name: Final_Usage_Records_Loop
loops.label: Final Usage Records Loop

recordLookups.name: Get_All_Final_Usage_By_Project
recordLookups.label: Get All Final Usage By Project

recordLookups.description: GC 12/13/22: Gets all Project Contact Roles associated with the Project.
recordLookups.name: Get_Project_Contact_Roles
recordLookups.label: Get Project Contact Roles

recordLookups.description: GC 12/09/2022: Bring the Final Usage records that kicked the process.
recordLookups.name: Select_Final_Usage_Records
recordLookups.label: Select Final Usage Records

recordUpdates.name: Update_Final_Usage_Records_with_Invoice_ID
recordUpdates.label: Update Final Usage Records with Invoice ID

fields.name: displaytxt_all_invalid
fields.fieldText: All previously selected records already contain a related Invoice. Please click Finish, go back and select valid records.

fields.name: displaytxt_invoice_information
fields.fieldText: Success! Your new Invoice was created and related to {!CountValidFinalUsageRecords} Final Usage record(s).

fields.name: displaytxt_billingcontactcreated
fields.fieldText: {!BillingContactName} was created as a Billing Contact for the Project "{!ProjectName}" and for the new Invoice.

fields.name: displaytxt_billingcontactassociated
fields.fieldText: {!BillingContactName} was associated to the new Invoice.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_displaytxt_invoice_information
fields.fieldText: Success! Your new Invoice was created and related to {!CountValidFinalUsageRecords} Final Usage record(s).

fields.name: Copy_1_of_displaytxt_billingcontactcreated
fields.fieldText: {!BillingContactName} was created as a Billing Contact for the Project "{!ProjectName}" and for the new Invoice.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_displaytxt_billingcontactassociated
fields.fieldText: {!BillingContactName} was associated to the new Invoice.

fields.name: displaytxt_idsnull
fields.fieldText: The Flow didn't receive any IDs, or the IDs are incorrect. Please click Finish and select valid records before proceeding.

fields.name: displaytxt_invalid_records_found
fields.fieldText: We found some records with related Invoices. These records will not be processed.

fields.name: displaytxt_valid_records_found
fields.fieldText: The following records are good to go. A new Invoice will be created and related to these records.

fields.name: Please_Project_Title
fields.fieldText: Please set the Project Title and invoice date assigned to the new Invoice.

validationRule.errorMessage: The Project Title must be less than 80 characters.

fields.name: displaytxt_selectbillingcontacts
fields.fieldText: Please select the Billing Contact to associate with the new Invoice.

value.stringValue: Available Billing Contacts Related to this Project

fields.name: displaytxt_otherbillingcontact
fields.fieldText: Please select the Contact you need on the following box to associate it with the Invoice and the Project.

fields.name: displaytxt_nobillingcontacts
fields.fieldText: We couldn't find Billing Contacts associated with this Project. Please select one on the following box to associate it with the Invoice and the Project.

value.stringValue: The Contact I need is not on the list

fields.name: displaytxt_continuenext
fields.fieldText: Once you are done, please click Next.

variables.description: GC 01/30/23: Added so the subflow knows when it's called as a child, and shows a different finish screen with the real Finish button instead of the LWC Finish button. This is done so the flow can actually refresh the record where it was launched, while the LWC button fakes a "back" browser button.
variables.name: calledAsSubflow

variables.description: GC: Holds the number of records that already have a related Invoice.
variables.name: CountInvalidFinalUsageRecords

variables.description: GC: Holds the records that stop the process for continuing with the task.
variables.name: InvalidFinalUsageRecords
